LABEL: 0x2E2
STRING: The sprinklers rained water down on us.

LABEL: 0x316
STRING: The drops bounced from the walls of the hallway.

LABEL: 0x338
STRING: It was a pitiful sound.

LABEL: 0x352
STRING: The sound of the alarm siren continued.

LABEL: 0x37E
STRING: Our shoes were hitting the hard surface of the water.

LABEL: 0x3A8
STRING: My vision was blurry.

LABEL: 0x3C4
STRING: I traced the flowing water without wiping myself off.

LABEL: 0x492
STRING: 「I'll deal with the fire.」

LABEL: 0x4C0
STRING: 「Hiragino-san, find Touri-san.」

LABEL: 0x554
STRING: 「Understood.」

LABEL: 0x5AB
STRING: Yukari took Tokiwa's hand and disappeared into the back of the hallway.

LABEL: 0x5F3
STRING: Their retreating figures looked like they were running away from me.

LABEL: 0x68A
STRING: ...My sister wasn't with me anymore.

LABEL: 0x6C8
STRING: Or Touri...

LABEL: 0x6E8
STRING: Or Yukari... Or Tokiwa...

LABEL: 0x70A
STRING: Everyone was leaving me behind.

LABEL: 0x73A
STRING: Their running figures were becoming blurred.

LABEL: 0x758
STRING: I saw them off without being able to move from where I stood.

LABEL: 0x859
STRING: 「Shit!!」

LABEL: 0x875
STRING: 「We can't see well like this!」

LABEL: 0x8DD
STRING: 「Where's Touri-kun?!」

LABEL: 0x924
STRING: Hiragino started running.

LABEL: 0x940
STRING: Despite the lack of calmness in his voice, there was no hesitation in his steps.

LABEL: 0x984
STRING: Did he smell death in the air, being a doctor?

LABEL: 0x9CA
STRING: If that was the case...

LABEL: 0xA47
STRING: What kind of smell would I have, then?

LABEL: 0xA81
STRING: How vile, hapless, and cruel would it be?

LABEL: 0xABD
STRING: How ugly?

LABEL: 0xB44
STRING: In my mind, I could see myself being washed away by the rain, dissolved, and exposed for what I really was.

LABEL: 0xB9A
STRING: A delusion.

LABEL: 0xBAE
STRING: Hiragino still held on to me with his right hand, and I was dragged along the flooded corridor.

LABEL: 0xC1A
STRING: The water had spread to the open lobby.

LABEL: 0xC40
STRING: If this abyss of space, isolated from the rest of the sea, were to disappear――

LABEL: 0xCDF
STRING: A pointless delusion.

LABEL: 0xD6E
STRING: For those people, there was no reason.

LABEL: 0xD9A
STRING: No reason, even though they died in agony without me knowing their names.

LABEL: 0xDEC
STRING: There was a reason for me, and I was living on carefree.

LABEL: 0xE7D
STRING: I thought of a corpse drifting by with an agonized expression on its face.

LABEL: 0xEA7
STRING: What would they think now?

LABEL: 0xED1
STRING: No.

LABEL: 0xEE5
STRING: There was no need to think about it.

LABEL: 0xF6D
STRING: ――I don't want to think about it.

LABEL: 0xFEA
STRING: Without warning, Hiragino let go of my hand.

LABEL: 0x101A
STRING: I rubbed my now free wrist with my left hand.

LABEL: 0x1046
STRING: There was a closed watertight door in front of us.

LABEL: 0x1070
STRING: Isolating the death beyond.

LABEL: 0x108C
STRING: A drop of water was leaking from a crack in the heavy door――

LABEL: 0x10C2
STRING: Spreading like a symbol of death.

LABEL: 0x10E8
STRING: And in the midst of it all――

LABEL: 0x1110
STRING: There were two familiar girls.

LABEL: 0x1145
STRING: 「Hey, what's going on?」

LABEL: 0x116C
STRING: Hiragino called out and ran to them.

LABEL: 0x1196
STRING: Reiri was lying on the floor, unconscious.

LABEL: 0x11BE
STRING: Touri was lying on top of her, and it seemed like she had not heard him.

LABEL: 0x1202
STRING: They were exposed to the water raining down from above.

LABEL: 0x122A
STRING: Without looking up, she shook Reiri, who was on her back on the floor.

LABEL: 0x1272
STRING: To the right, to the left, over and over again in a morbid rhythm.

LABEL: 0x12B0
STRING: Ah...

LABEL: 0x1395
STRING: 「Touri-kun!」

LABEL: 0x13C0
STRING: 「Reiri...」

LABEL: 0x1439
STRING: 「――Reiri!」

LABEL: 0x145C
STRING: Touri noticed Hiragino and looked up at him.

LABEL: 0x1488
STRING: She was shivering.

LABEL: 0x149C
STRING: Water dripped down her face.

LABEL: 0x14BC
STRING: Tears.

LABEL: 0x14CE
STRING: I didn't want to see her like this――

LABEL: 0x150F
STRING: 「Help her, Hiragino-san!!」

LABEL: 0x1572
STRING: As if in response to her scream, Hiragino rushed over to them.

LABEL: 0x15BA
STRING: When he landed on one knee beside Reiri, he supported her upper body to clear her airways.

LABEL: 0x1606
STRING: He covered her slender body and began to massage her heart.

LABEL: 0x16A9
STRING: Touri collapsed to the floor.

LABEL: 0x16C9
STRING: She was holding her head and crying silently as she looked at Reiri.

LABEL: 0x170F
STRING: Like a doll abandoned on the side of the road.

LABEL: 0x1741
STRING: Like a broken toy.

LABEL: 0x1763
STRING: She was a mere shadow of her former self, having lost her will.

LABEL: 0x17A1
STRING: She looked like she could be crippled herself.

LABEL: 0x17E9
STRING: Why... Why was this happening?

LABEL: 0x1817
STRING: Who's fault was it―

LABEL: 0x182E
STRING: no,

LABEL: 0x1841
STRING: that was a given, wasn't it?

LABEL: 0x1867
STRING: Why should she be punished for my sins?

LABEL: 0x1895
STRING: I could see Hiragino trying his best to save Reiri, and Touri grieving beside them as if they were on the other side of a monitor.

LABEL: 0x18DD
STRING: Why was I not able to go to them――?

LABEL: 0x1983
STRING: 「There... That should be good for now.」

LABEL: 0x19B5
STRING: 「Let's get her to the emergency room.」

LABEL: 0x1A32
STRING: 「You come too, Touri-kun.」

LABEL: 0x1A65
STRING: 「Yeah...」

LABEL: 0x1A9C
STRING: Hiragino carried Reiri on her back.

LABEL: 0x1AC4
STRING: Touri was clutching her outstretched hand.

LABEL: 0x1AF2
STRING: Why was I just standing here, under the sprinklers, before that desperate girl?

LABEL: 0x1B56
STRING: The future wasn't certain.

LABEL: 0x1B74
STRING: The past was already set.

LABEL: 0x1B92
STRING: Salvation for them... And for me,

LABEL: 0x1C0E
STRING: a curse.

LABEL: 0x1C22
STRING: 「Hey, over here!」

LABEL: 0x1C42
STRING: I heard a voice mixed in with the sirens and the sound of water.

LABEL: 0x1C78
STRING: 「What are you doing? Come on.」

LABEL: 0x1CA0
STRING: Where was it coming from? Who was calling me?

LABEL: 0x1CC6
STRING: The echoing voice tortured me.

LABEL: 0x1CF2
STRING: I stood there with my eyes closed and my ears covered.

LABEL: 0x1D24
STRING: Stop it.

LABEL: 0x1D3A
STRING: Please stop it.

LABEL: 0x1D54
STRING: Just leave me alone, please――!

LABEL: 0x1DF1
STRING: The sprinklers hitting my body eventually stopped, and I was greeted with silence as I opened my eyes.

LABEL: 0x1E51
STRING: A flooded hallway.

LABEL: 0x1E6D
STRING: There was a puddle of water in my shadow, under my feet.

LABEL: 0x1E9D
STRING: Suddenly, I saw a face reflected on it.

LABEL: 0x1ECD
STRING: I got on my knees without thinking.

LABEL: 0x1EFD
STRING: Drops of water dripped down from my hair.

LABEL: 0x1F21
STRING: The surface of the water wavered.

LABEL: 0x1F3B
STRING: I saw my sister's face in the reflection, who had looked a lot like me.

LABEL: 0x1F7B
STRING: 「Nee-san...」

LABEL: 0x1F97
STRING: That's right――

LABEL: 0x1FAF
STRING: It was my sister who kept calling out to me.

LABEL: 0x1FE5
STRING: Why did she look like she was about to cry?

LABEL: 0x201D
STRING: Sorry for taking so long.

LABEL: 0x203D
STRING: I slowly reached out to her.

LABEL: 0x2075
STRING: I'm coming to you now――

LABEL: 0x20AA
STRING: 「What are you doing, лл-san?」

LABEL: 0x213C
STRING: A voice pulled me back to reality.

LABEL: 0x215C
STRING: I heard the sound of approaching footsteps.

LABEL: 0x217C
STRING: Plod, plod...

LABEL: 0x219A
STRING: Nee-san's face disappeared in the ripples.

LABEL: 0x21CE
STRING: No.

LABEL: 0x21E2
STRING: It was my own face reflected on the water.

LABEL: 0x2214
STRING: I retracted my outstretched arm.

LABEL: 0x223A
STRING: When I turned to look, Yukari was there looking down at me.

LABEL: 0x22E6
STRING: 「Do you enjoy playing the madman?」

LABEL: 0x2312
STRING: 「We can't afford to be running away from reality.」

LABEL: 0x234E
STRING: 「Come to the emergency room.」

LABEL: 0x26CB
STRING: Touri was looking down at the bed.

LABEL: 0x26EF
STRING: She seemed to have regained some of her composure, but her face was still pale.

LABEL: 0x2755
STRING: Tokiwa was sitting on a chair by the wall with her eyes closed, all tired out.

LABEL: 0x27A1
STRING: Yukari seemed uneasy as well, shifting her gaze and caressing her shoulders.

LABEL: 0x27ED
STRING: And on the bed was Reiri, who had everyone's attention.

LABEL: 0x282B
STRING: ――The scene from a few hours ago comes back to me.

LABEL: 0x2853
STRING: A space dominated by despair.

LABEL: 0x2875
STRING: Hiragino looked up from the PC screen he was facing.

LABEL: 0x2917
STRING: 「...She's fine. There won't be any issues for now.」

LABEL: 0x2956
STRING: "For now."

LABEL: 0x2974
STRING: I wondered if that reserved statement was due to the limited facilities in the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x29B2
STRING: As he put away the equipment and wiped the sweat from his forehead, he noticed Touri looking up at him, worried.

LABEL: 0x2AD1
STRING: 「She's just lost consciousness.」

LABEL: 0x2AF7
STRING: 「She'll wake up eventually.」

LABEL: 0x2B82
STRING: 「But other than that, you'll all catch a cold like this.」

LABEL: 0x2C05
STRING: He tossed a white towel to each of us as he left Reiri's side.

LABEL: 0x2C61
STRING: I had been too excited and upset to notice until now, but we were all soaked wet.

LABEL: 0x2CBF
STRING: I took the towel and dried my wet hair with it.

LABEL: 0x2D09
STRING: Hiragino removed his trademark white coat. A slender yet muscular figure was revealed underneath, far removed from the typical image of a doctor.

LABEL: 0x2D9F
STRING: He hung his wet coat on the wall and picked up a replacement that was hanging next to it.

LABEL: 0x2DFB
STRING: He produced a xylitol tablet from somewhere, put it in his mouth with gusto, and started chewing.

LABEL: 0x2E51
STRING: Afterward, he spun around to face us and looked at Touri.

LABEL: 0x2F5E
STRING: 「So... What happened?」

LABEL: 0x2FB8
STRING: He asked slowly but clearly.

LABEL: 0x2FEE
STRING: There was no reply.

LABEL: 0x3008
STRING: Touri kept her mouth shut and turned away from Hiragino, avoiding eye contact.

LABEL: 0x3086
STRING: ...Was she scared of something?

LABEL: 0x30AC
STRING: But what, exactly?

LABEL: 0x30CA
STRING: Touri hugged her trembling body.

LABEL: 0x30F8
STRING: Yukari came and covered her back with her own towel.

LABEL: 0x31F7
STRING: 「You don't have to talk if you don't want to.」

LABEL: 0x321B
STRING: 「But... What should I talk about?」

LABEL: 0x323D
STRING: 「...Just tell me whatever you can.」

LABEL: 0x3278
STRING: Hiragino urged her again.

LABEL: 0x3333
STRING: Raising her head and glancing over at Hiragino, Touri slowly began to talk.

LABEL: 0x33A7
STRING: ――Rabbit?

LABEL: 0x33C1
STRING: No one heard her almost inaudible mumbling but me.

LABEL: 0x3413
STRING: Did I hear that right?

LABEL: 0x3435
STRING: Touri shook her head.

LABEL: 0x34C9
STRING: 「Oh, no, um...」

LABEL: 0x34ED
STRING: 「I don't know...」

LABEL: 0x356C
STRING: 「I came here to check on Reiri, but she was gone.」

LABEL: 0x35A4
STRING: 「I was so upset that I started looking for her by myself.」

LABEL: 0x3637
STRING: 「In front of the bridge, Reiri...」

LABEL: 0x3663
STRING: 「And the next thing I knew, I heard sirens.」

LABEL: 0x3697
STRING: 「And the sprinklers...」

LABEL: 0x37B6
STRING: Touri leaned forward.

LABEL: 0x37DE
STRING: At that time.

LABEL: 0x380E
STRING: The towel around her neck fell off.

LABEL: 0x384B
STRING: 「That's...」

LABEL: 0x38F2
STRING: The water-soaked towel hit the floor with a sticky sound.

LABEL: 0x3942
STRING: I reflexively turned my eyes to look at it.

LABEL: 0x397C
STRING: Red.

LABEL: 0x39A8
STRING: Parts of the wet towel were stained bright red.

LABEL: 0x3A50
STRING: 「...Huh, what... is this?」

LABEL: 0x3A7B
STRING: Touri turned pale.

LABEL: 0x3A97
STRING: Losing her balance, she took a couple of unsteady steps backward.

LABEL: 0x3AD1
STRING: Hiragino caught her from the front and supported her.

LABEL: 0x3B95
STRING: 「Are you injured?」

LABEL: 0x3C11
STRING: She silently shook her head from side to side.

LABEL: 0x3C37
STRING: Indeed, she was pale, but there was no sign of trauma.

LABEL: 0x3C71
STRING: But the blood on the towel had to have come from somewhere.

LABEL: 0x3CC1
STRING: Hiragino carefully observed Touri's body and cocked his head, puzzled.

LABEL: 0x3D67
STRING: 「Hmmm... Do you remember anything?」

LABEL: 0x3D92
STRING: He stared at her squarely, and she looked away again.

LABEL: 0x3DCC
STRING: In that direction was Reiri―no, she was looking at something further away.

LABEL: 0x3E0A
STRING: I didn't see anything... Was there something there?

LABEL: 0x3F30
STRING: 「? What was that?」

LABEL: 0x3F57
STRING: Touri whispered something.

LABEL: 0x3F81
STRING: It was more like an accidental murmur than an intentional word.

LABEL: 0x3FBF
STRING: I guess there was nothing to it.

LABEL: 0x401F
STRING: If Reiri was the one injured, Hiragino would have already found it and treated her.

LABEL: 0x4075
STRING: And besides, Touri hadn't carried Reiri here in the first place.

LABEL: 0x40B1
STRING: She was at her limit here.

LABEL: 0x4157
STRING: 「I don't know... I don't know...」

LABEL: 0x41E4
STRING: 「...I'm sorry.」

LABEL: 0x4206
STRING: 「I'm... sorry...」

LABEL: 0x422E
STRING: 「I couldn't protect Reiri...」

LABEL: 0x4256
STRING: 「I didn't face her properly...」

LABEL: 0x432A
STRING: 「――That's enough.」

LABEL: 0x4367
STRING: Hiragino interrupted the hysterical Touri.

LABEL: 0x4399
STRING: She opened her eyes and shed tears.

LABEL: 0x43CB
STRING: ...It was heartbreaking.

LABEL: 0x43E7
STRING: Hiragino smiled at the sad Touri, even though she seemed to be blaming herself.

LABEL: 0x44A7
STRING: 「That's enough... Thank you.」

LABEL: 0x44CF
STRING: 「I'm sorry for forcing you to talk.」

LABEL: 0x4558
STRING: 「――Momoi.」

LABEL: 0x4659
STRING: 「Touri-san, come here.」

LABEL: 0x4682
STRING: Yukari held Touri's shoulders.

LABEL: 0x46A6
STRING: While pushing her back, she naturally faced Hiragino at point-blank range.

LABEL: 0x47D3
STRING: 「We need to talk for a minute.」

LABEL: 0x4806
STRING: 「Right.」

LABEL: 0x4824
STRING: 「But there's one thing first――」

LABEL: 0x4887
STRING: Yukari pulled herself close to his ear and whispered something to Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x4A6F
STRING: 「Well, it's getting late. We'll be heading for the crew quarters.」

LABEL: 0x4AAB
STRING: 「If you need help with anything, just let me know.」

LABEL: 0x4AE6
STRING: 「...I'll be counting on you.」

LABEL: 0x4BCF
STRING: 「Come one, Tokiwa-san. Let's go.」

LABEL: 0x4C0C
STRING: 「Hwaoh...!」

LABEL: 0x4C67
STRING: With Yukari pulling the sleepy Tokiwa by the hand, three people left the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x4CCC
STRING: I looked at the clock on the wall and saw it was almost midnight.

LABEL: 0x4D02
STRING: I hadn't realized it, but I was definitely exhausted.

LABEL: 0x4D6E
STRING: ――Both physically and mentally.

LABEL: 0x4D98
STRING: I was alone with Hiragino in the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x4DBE
STRING: ...My confession had been thrown aside by the current situation.

LABEL: 0x4DFC
STRING: No one dared to say anything, but they had not forgotten.

LABEL: 0x4E48
STRING: I had calmed down and was ready to tell him everything again.

LABEL: 0x4E8E
STRING: There was no point in running away anymore.

LABEL: 0x4EB6
STRING: Reiri had been attacked.

LABEL: 0x4ED2
STRING: There was a new threat lurking inside the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x4EFD
STRING: We had to stick together.

LABEL: 0x4F99
STRING: 「Hey, лл-kun.」

LABEL: 0x5044
STRING: 「лл-kun?」

LABEL: 0x5065
STRING: 「Hm, what?」

LABEL: 0x507F
STRING: 「What's wrong?」

LABEL: 0x509B
STRING: Our eyes met.

LABEL: 0x50B3
STRING: I pretended not to notice the suspicion in his gaze and brushed it off.

LABEL: 0x50F5
STRING: With Reiri lying on the bed beside him, Hiragino opened his mouth with a mysterious look on his face.

LABEL: 0x51A9
STRING: 「...Okay, first things first.」

LABEL: 0x5232
STRING: 「Take off your clothes.」

LABEL: 0x525B
STRING: ...Excuse me?

LABEL: 0x52FD
STRING: 「Just hurry up.」

LABEL: 0x5320
STRING: While saying that, he started unbuttoning my clothes with an experienced hand.

LABEL: 0x537A
STRING: Hey, hey, hey, hey, wait!

LABEL: 0x53A6
STRING: 「Uh, you know, there's a girl sleeping right there?」

LABEL: 0x543E
STRING: 「It's all right, she won't see.」

LABEL: 0x5467
STRING: What a fiend.

LABEL: 0x5485
STRING: I knew this guy was a sadist.

LABEL: 0x54B2
STRING: In no time at all, my chest was exposed.

LABEL: 0x54E4
STRING: 「Hey, time out!」

LABEL: 0x5578
STRING: 「――What?」

LABEL: 0x5597
STRING: I stepped aside and shrank back as if to protect myself.

LABEL: 0x55D7
STRING: ...Time froze.

LABEL: 0x55F5
STRING: This is so surreal...

LABEL: 0x5670
STRING: Hiragino let out a sigh and scratched his head.

LABEL: 0x570A
STRING: 「...Are you perhaps misunderstanding something?」

LABEL: 0x5736
STRING: 「I'm telling you to undress to not catch a cold.」

LABEL: 0x5773
STRING: Huh..? Oh.

LABEL: 0x5791
STRING: It was true that I was wetter than the others, having stood right under the sprinklers for longer.

LABEL: 0x57ED
STRING: I was thrown one of the lab coats hanging on the wall.

LABEL: 0x5830
STRING: 「You can take your clothes off in the drying area over there.」

LABEL: 0x5871
STRING: 「Yeah...」

LABEL: 0x58F7
STRING: 「Now then...」

LABEL: 0x5932
STRING: While I was changing my clothes, as I was told, Hiragino had poured me a cup of tea in the meantime and handed it to me.

LABEL: 0x5988
STRING: 「Thanks...」

LABEL: 0x59A4
STRING: I noticed that the sleeves of the lab coat were a bit too long for me as I reached out to accept the cup.

LABEL: 0x59E6
STRING: This tall and handsome guy...

LABEL: 0x5A0C
STRING: I took a sip of the tea and set the cup down, impressed by how decent it tasted.

LABEL: 0x5ADA
STRING: 「Have you calmed down?」

LABEL: 0x5AFF
STRING: 「Ah, yeah...」

LABEL: 0x5B2C
STRING: 「Want some xylitol?」

LABEL: 0x5B59
STRING: 「No thanks.」

LABEL: 0x5BDF
STRING: 「I see...」

LABEL: 0x5C00
STRING: 「So, what――」

LABEL: 0x5C8E
STRING: 「I want to hear your story.」

LABEL: 0x5CB9
STRING: He looked me straight in the eye.

LABEL: 0x5CDF
STRING: Was this a habit of his?

LABEL: 0x5CFD
STRING: I wanted to look away but persevered.

LABEL: 0x5D6E
STRING: 「Earlier... you said something about changing the course of this ship.」

LABEL: 0x5DB4
STRING: 「Was that... true?」

LABEL: 0x5DDB
STRING: I nodded once in silence.

LABEL: 0x5E65
STRING: 「...The <SHEEP III> is a state-of-the-art submarine.」

LABEL: 0x5EF5
STRING: 「Is a thing like that really possible for a mere graduate student?」

LABEL: 0x5F3C
STRING: 「Maybe not for a mere graduate student.」

LABEL: 0x5F74
STRING: 「But I've been preparing for this for a long time.」

LABEL: 0x5FAC
STRING: 「So, it's not impossible.」

LABEL: 0x6040
STRING: 「Did someone help you?」

LABEL: 0x6069
STRING: 「I had no help.」

LABEL: 0x608D
STRING: 「I couldn't talk to anyone in case they leaked my plans to ROMLES.」

LABEL: 0x60DD
STRING: 「From planning to execution――」

LABEL: 0x60FF
STRING: 「――It was all done by me.」

LABEL: 0x613C
STRING: 「...I see.」

LABEL: 0x6177
STRING: Hiragino hung his head.

LABEL: 0x619F
STRING: I tried to figure out the emotions behind his eyes but couldn't see any sadness or anger there.

LABEL: 0x61F9
STRING: Only, a somewhat painful look.

LABEL: 0x62A3
STRING: 「Why did you do a thing like that...?」

LABEL: 0x62D6
STRING: Why... you ask?

LABEL: 0x62F6
STRING: What was the point of asking that now?

LABEL: 0x6324
STRING: Whatever I was doing,

LABEL: 0x634A
STRING: whatever I was doing it for,

LABEL: 0x636C
STRING: it was all over...

LABEL: 0x6407
STRING: ――But... was it really?

LABEL: 0x6429
STRING: Had it really all come to an end?

LABEL: 0x645F
STRING: Could I throw it all aside and say it was "over?"

LABEL: 0x6491
STRING: Before there can be an end, there is a beginning.

LABEL: 0x64BB
STRING: I remember it――

LABEL: 0x64DB
STRING: The beginning of everything.

LABEL: 0x6569
STRING: ――Seven years ago.

LABEL: 0x65B7
STRING: I had a sister.

LABEL: 0x65DD
STRING: My sister was six years older than me and raised me after our parents died when we were very young.

LABEL: 0x661E
STRING: She was my sister and my mother. My cheerful and kind Nee-san.

LABEL: 0x665A
STRING: While going through high school and college,

LABEL: 0x668E
STRING: she never once talked about her hardships while taking care of me.

LABEL: 0x66D2
STRING: She started working at ROMLES right after she entered graduate school.

LABEL: 0x6822
STRING: 「Your sister worked at ROMLES?」

LABEL: 0x684F
STRING: 「She always loved the sea, ever since she was a little girl.」

LABEL: 0x688D
STRING: 「So, when she got a job at ROMLES, I was happy for her...」

LABEL: 0x68E3
STRING: 「And yet――」

LABEL: 0x69FC
STRING: 「Hey, listen to this!」

LABEL: 0x6A1C
STRING: 「...Welcome back, Nee-san.」

LABEL: 0x6A42
STRING: It was a day in late spring.

LABEL: 0x6A70
STRING: As soon as she'd come home from work, my sister had tackled my back while I was sitting on the floor playing a video game.

LABEL: 0x6ADC
STRING: I had gotten used to the feeling of her weight on me.

LABEL: 0x6B18
STRING: It had been a habit of hers since she was a child. When she was happy, her displays of affection turned violent.

LABEL: 0x6B74
STRING: I didn't know if it was because of that, but――

LABEL: 0x6BA2
STRING: Her face wasn't bad, even taking the favoritism as her brother into account, but she still hadn't had a single boyfriend.

LABEL: 0x6BFE
STRING: She got up excitedly and went to stand in front of the TV.

LABEL: 0x6C4C
STRING: ...You're in the way.

LABEL: 0x6C66
STRING: I made an annoyed face, but she looked down at me with a big grin, not caring one bit.

LABEL: 0x6CD0
STRING: I paused the game and threw the controller aside.

LABEL: 0x6D1A
STRING: 「So, what is it?」

LABEL: 0x6D3C
STRING: 「I'm finally going to ride a submarine!」

LABEL: 0x6D80
STRING: 「...Huh. Congrats.」

LABEL: 0x6DAC
STRING: 「Dorya!」

LABEL: 0x6E2B
STRING: I braced to ward off her chopping attack to the top of my head.

LABEL: 0x6E7F
STRING: Her hand was stopped midair between my palms, like catching the blade of a sword.

LABEL: 0x6ECF
STRING: 「Hey, what was that for?!」

LABEL: 0x6EF7
STRING: 「Don't you have anything to say to me?」

LABEL: 0x6F1F
STRING: 「I said "congrats," didn't I?」

LABEL: 0x6F53
STRING: 「Your heart wasn't in it, so it didn't count!」

LABEL: 0x6F81
STRING: 「What the hell...」

LABEL: 0x6FA3
STRING: Geez... Was this sister of mine really an adult?

LABEL: 0x6FDD
STRING: She acted the same toward me as always, but...

LABEL: 0x7019
STRING: I couldn't help but feel like I was the one whose been taking care of her since I entered high school.

LABEL: 0x7073
STRING: Unaware of my inner thoughts, she shrugged her shoulders with a "geez" and raised an index finger.

LABEL: 0x70E3
STRING: 「Do you know what a submarine is in the first place?」

LABEL: 0x7198
STRING: How old did she think I was?

LABEL: 0x71E8
STRING: It didn't look like she was making fun of me, as she was being somewhat serious...

LABEL: 0x7295
STRING: 「A submarine is, first of all――」

LABEL: 0x72C1
STRING: 「I know what it is! It's common knowledge! I mean, I just went to see one the other day!」

LABEL: 0x7337
STRING: I wasn't as big of a fan of the sea as my sister, who had more admiration for it than anyone I knew.

LABEL: 0x737D
STRING: I took four of my reluctant friends to see a submarine at Aquamarine Land a few days ago.

LABEL: 0x73DC
STRING: I pulled them along, pushed all the kids out of the way, and got inside the submarine――

LABEL: 0x7434
STRING: ――It was very... refined.

LABEL: 0x746C
STRING: 「Aquamarine Land?」

LABEL: 0x7493
STRING: 「Tsk, tsk. Don't try to deceive me with your childish tricks.」

LABEL: 0x74D7
STRING: 「That's right.」

LABEL: 0x74F1
STRING: I couldn't help but be annoyed with her.

LABEL: 0x7535
STRING: I don't care about that stupid pose you're making, just let me continue the game.

LABEL: 0x758D
STRING: I picked up the controller I had just thrown aside,

LABEL: 0x76F9
STRING: and as I%Nlooked back up, stars filled my vision.

LABEL: 0x7741
STRING: 「I told you to listen!」

LABEL: 0x776F
STRING: Resorting to violence, my sister raised her right hand.

LABEL: 0x77A1
STRING: Just because we were inside the house didn't mean she could be violent...

LABEL: 0x77D9
STRING: Damn it...

LABEL: 0x77EF
STRING: I couldn't win against this selfish kid.

LABEL: 0x7813
STRING: I raised my hands to motion surrender.

LABEL: 0x7847
STRING: 「Yeah, yeah, I'm sorry. Please enlighten me about this submarine, my dear Nee-san.」

LABEL: 0x78AF
STRING: 「Good. I'd be happy to.」

LABEL: 0x78D5
STRING: My sarcasm didn't seem to get through to her.

LABEL: 0x7913
STRING: Smiling broadly, she started her explanation.

LABEL: 0x7951
STRING: 「You see, I'll be riding in a――」

LABEL: 0x79E3
STRING: 「――ROMLES deep-sea research vessel!」

LABEL: 0x7B1F
STRING: 「A ROMLES submarine...」

LABEL: 0x7B43
STRING: 「No way, your sister――」

LABEL: 0x7B72
STRING: 「Yes.」

LABEL: 0x7B8C
STRING: 「Seven years ago, Nee-san...」

LABEL: 0x7BB0
STRING: 「...Was caught in an accident on this sea floor.」

LABEL: 0x7C60
STRING: It was a boiling hot summer day.

LABEL: 0x7D01
STRING: I was alone in my room that day, playing on my PC at my desk.

LABEL: 0x7D43
STRING: Our parents had built this far too nice house for the two of us to live in when they were still alive.

LABEL: 0x7DB1
STRING: However, the neglected AC system had started to act up.

LABEL: 0x7DFD
STRING: The AC I'd had running at full blast every morning for the past week finally stopped working that morning.

LABEL: 0x7E69
STRING: I had my hands full just cooling the PC in front of me.

LABEL: 0x7EA7
STRING: And all the while, sweat was dripping down my forehead.

LABEL: 0x7EFF
STRING: 「Hey, can you bring me tea, Nee-sa――」

LABEL: 0x7F29
STRING: The moment I was about to say that, I remembered.

LABEL: 0x7F55
STRING: 「Right... She's not here.」

LABEL: 0x7F87
STRING: What caught my eye was a calendar hanging on the wall.

LABEL: 0x7FC1
STRING: Today's date was circled multiple times in red.

LABEL: 0x8003
STRING: She was still managing her schedule by paper...

LABEL: 0x802F
STRING: Her analog habits didn't stop at the calendar, as she also used a paper diary, which was a luxury item nowadays.

LABEL: 0x809D
STRING: The marked date on the calendar was――

LABEL: 0x80DF
STRING: The day my sister had been waiting for. The start of the investigation.

LABEL: 0x817C
STRING: My sister, who had talked about riding the submarine non-stop day and night, was no longer in the house.

LABEL: 0x8202
STRING: And probably no longer on land either...

LABEL: 0x822E
STRING: Yes.

LABEL: 0x829F
STRING: I was sure she was out under the sea inside a submarine by now...

LABEL: 0x82D9
STRING: No, I wondered.

LABEL: 0x82FD
STRING: Would this investigation of hers go so smoothly?

LABEL: 0x8343
STRING: Not that I was doubting ROMLES... But I couldn't imagine her being able to keep to a schedule.

LABEL: 0x83AD
STRING: She had said that the investigation was scheduled to last a week, but I had a feeling she was already causing trouble.

LABEL: 0x8405
STRING: Like... forgetting something important?

LABEL: 0x8429
STRING: ...No, no. She was a reasonable adult.

LABEL: 0x8463
STRING: Doing something so trivial and childish would be...

LABEL: 0x850C
STRING: Last night, I could hear heavy sounds coming from her room until quite late.

LABEL: 0x85BF
STRING: 「Hey, quiet down――!」

LABEL: 0x85EB
STRING: As I opened her door to complain, she turned around toward me.

LABEL: 0x8635
STRING: 「Ah, no! I've got all the sea essentials packed around there, so don't move――」

LABEL: 0x8693
STRING: ...Sea essentials.

LABEL: 0x86B1
STRING: I didn't even want to know how many legs this big pill-bug-looking thing had.

LABEL: 0x870F
STRING: 「...Nee-san, didn't you say that submarines calculated their cargo by the gram?」

LABEL: 0x8767
STRING: 「Yeah, they do.」

LABEL: 0x8787
STRING: 「And you're taking all this with you?」

LABEL: 0x87ED
STRING: 「Well, there's always a margin for error in calculations.」

LABEL: 0x880F
STRING: 「No, there isn't! Do them correctly!」

LABEL: 0x8841
STRING: ...Haah.

LABEL: 0x8859
STRING: 「Really... You're not a kid going on a field trip...」

LABEL: 0x8895
STRING: She was hugging the stuffed animal protectively, clearly unhappy.

LABEL: 0x88F1
STRING: 「Anyway, go to sleep soon. If you don't get enough sleep, you won't be able to enjoy the deep sea.」

LABEL: 0x8941
STRING: 「...Yeah.」

LABEL: 0x895B
STRING: 「Well, then...」

LABEL: 0x8979
STRING: I was about to close the door when――

LABEL: 0x89A1
STRING: 「Ah, wait.」

LABEL: 0x89D9
STRING: 「Thanks.」

LABEL: 0x8A0B
STRING: I found it difficult to come up with a reply, with her saying that with such innocent eyes.

LABEL: 0x8A45
STRING: 「...That's right!」

LABEL: 0x8A63
STRING: With that, my sister clapped her hands together as if she had remembered something.

LABEL: 0x8A9B
STRING: 「A quiz! I just came up with a great one!」

LABEL: 0x8AD3
STRING: 「I just told you to go to bed.」

LABEL: 0x8B09
STRING: 「It's fine. Hey――」

LABEL: 0x8B2F
STRING: 「――Where does it snow during midsummer?」

LABEL: 0x8BC6
STRING: The noise from her room eventually stopped...

LABEL: 0x8BFA
STRING: ...Two hours after I had returned to my room.

LABEL: 0x8C95
STRING: 「Haaah――」

LABEL: 0x8CAF
STRING: I was sure she must've forgotten something.

LABEL: 0x8CED
STRING: I didn't know if it could be delivered if she realized it now...

LABEL: 0x8D2D
STRING: Well, it can't be helped.

LABEL: 0x8D49
STRING: I slowly got up.

LABEL: 0x8DEC
STRING: 「...I'm coming in.」

LABEL: 0x8E0A
STRING: There was no one in her room.

LABEL: 0x8E30
STRING: There was no one but me in the house now, but I knocked before entering anyway.

LABEL: 0x8E8A
STRING: And――

LABEL: 0x8EFF
STRING: 「Whoa...」

LABEL: 0x8F1B
STRING: Clearly, the situation had gotten worse since last night.

LABEL: 0x8F4F
STRING: There was a vivid fluorescent jellyfish connected to an electric light switch and a curtain with a nudibranch pattern.

LABEL: 0x8FA1
STRING: On the wall was a panoramic poster of a realistic-looking shark predation.

LABEL: 0x8FF1
STRING: And, of course, a sperm whale body pillow lay on the sea-colored futon with an arrogant look on its face.

LABEL: 0x9055
STRING: Other items included small shelves, clocks, cushions...

LABEL: 0x9087
STRING: Nearly all of the furnishings in this room were based on motifs of the sea and sea creatures.

LABEL: 0x90DB
STRING: Whenever I saw this room, it reminded me of a ransacked aquarium souvenir shop.

LABEL: 0x912D
STRING: In addition to all that, today, there were piles of papers scattered on the floor, seemingly taken out of the drawers last night and left there.

LABEL: 0x91A9
STRING: The contrast was almost like――

LABEL: 0x91E1
STRING: 「The sea... No, a sea of rot.」

LABEL: 0x9205
STRING: I followed the scant footholds in the room, trying not to step on the scattered papers.

LABEL: 0x925D
STRING: There were even some discarded clothes lying about. Things were getting chaotic.

LABEL: 0x92AD
STRING: I told her to clean up every day, but...

LABEL: 0x92DF
STRING: I'd scold her when she got back, yeah.

LABEL: 0x9309
STRING: 「And, there――!」

LABEL: 0x9327
STRING: I finally made it to her desk.

LABEL: 0x9359
STRING: This was a bit like exploring a dungeon in a video game...

LABEL: 0x93FC
STRING: ...And.

LABEL: 0x9412
STRING: 「Hm?」

LABEL: 0x9428
STRING: On the desk.

LABEL: 0x943E
STRING: There were numerous marine-related books, as usual, and piles of printouts.

LABEL: 0x947E
STRING: Models of crustaceans were laid about.

LABEL: 0x94A4
STRING: In the middle of them...

LABEL: 0x94BC
STRING: There was something familiar...

LABEL: 0x94EC
STRING: 「Nee-san...」

LABEL: 0x9508
STRING: It was her favorite dolphin-pattern notebook.

LABEL: 0x95A5
STRING: Really.

LABEL: 0x95BD
STRING: How could you forget this on such an important day?

LABEL: 0x95F7
STRING: She was just too careless.

LABEL: 0x9629
STRING: I had a hard time understanding what she was thinking, using paper notebooks one after another.

LABEL: 0x9679
STRING: I picked it up and snapped it open, almost starting to flip through the pages without thinking...

LABEL: 0x96F7
STRING: Well, whatever.

LABEL: 0x9713
STRING: I thought something about this being private information, but I guess there were no secrets between brothers and sisters.

LABEL: 0x9761
STRING: Or rather, it was worse for her to leave this behind in the first place.

LABEL: 0x9797
STRING: That's right.

LABEL: 0x97AD
STRING: I'd have to check if she could do without this notebook. Yeah.

LABEL: 0x9801
STRING: "Spying" had a bad ring to it.

LABEL: 0x9831
STRING: I had no choice but to look into this for her sake.

LABEL: 0x9869
STRING: Yep, let's go with that.

LABEL: 0x988B
STRING: I was on the verge of putting the notebook down but started to flip through the pages.

LABEL: 0x98CD
STRING: ...But still, this was bad.

LABEL: 0x98F1
STRING: It was full of unorganized and miscellaneous information, such as daily schedules and calculations.

LABEL: 0x9959
STRING: Yes, just like her life itself.

LABEL: 0x998F
STRING: During high school, college, and now as a member of society.

LABEL: 0x99BB
STRING: Even though we were living together, the distance between me and my sister's life was getting wider and wider.

LABEL: 0x9A15
STRING: And I didn't necessarily mean that in a negative way, but...

LABEL: 0x9A53
STRING: I suddenly felt the loneliness of not being able to see each other.

LABEL: 0x9A99
STRING: These pages contained her daily life with round, deformed marine creatures scribbled on each one.

LABEL: 0x9AFB
STRING: I traced them page by page, feeling nostalgic.

LABEL: 0x9B43
STRING: I think I understand a little bit more about you now, Nee-san.

LABEL: 0x9B7D
STRING: One after the other, my speed of turning the pages gradually increased.

LABEL: 0x9BC3
STRING: From past to present, the dates counting up reached yesterday, and today――

LABEL: 0x9C07
STRING: 「This――」

LABEL: 0x9C23
STRING: A page marked in red.

LABEL: 0x9C4B
STRING: A headline spread over two pages.

LABEL: 0x9C81
STRING: 「SHEEP...?」

LABEL: 0x9CA4
STRING: Why "sheep?"

LABEL: 0x9CC0
STRING: Come to think of it, she had been talking a lot about sheep or whales lately...

LABEL: 0x9D0E
STRING: Was it the name of some project?

LABEL: 0x9D3A
STRING: ――And.

LABEL: 0x9D50
STRING: Drawn next to it was a doodle of a submarine.

LABEL: 0x9D88
STRING: So that meant...

LABEL: 0x9DA6
STRING: This... was the investigation plan?

LABEL: 0x9DD0
STRING: And the numbers beside it... Three-dimensional coordinates?

LABEL: 0x9E02
STRING: I took out my portable device and searched for the numbers.

LABEL: 0x9E48
STRING: 「...Kurama Bay...」

LABEL: 0x9E68
STRING: Is that the investigation site?

LABEL: 0x9E88
STRING: The first thing that came to mind when I heard Kurama Bay was, of course, Aquamarine Park.

LABEL: 0x9ED6
STRING: The establishment itself was initially meant to be a PR tool for ROMLES.

LABEL: 0x9F28
STRING: There was a research facility located on the other side of the park.

LABEL: 0x9F60
STRING: Their technology supported the world's largest marine theme park.

LABEL: 0x9FA8
STRING: It was a big story when you thought about it, especially since she was boarding this new submarine ROMLES was so proud of.

LABEL: 0xA00C
STRING: I bet she was getting so excited right now...

LABEL: 0xA04A
STRING: I was only worried about whether she was bothering her co-workers.

LABEL: 0xA084
STRING: I wondered if she would make her long-time dream of seeing an oarfish come true.

LABEL: 0xA0C0
STRING: I thought about my sister, with her eyes shining brightly.

LABEL: 0xA153
STRING: Four days later, I received a call from an unknown number.

LABEL: 0xA202
STRING: 「Yes, hello?」

LABEL: 0xA222
STRING: I heard an unfamiliar man's voice when I picked up the phone.

LABEL: 0xA252
STRING: He identified himself as an employee of ROMLES.

LABEL: 0xA27E
STRING: Ah, I see. This was about the investigation, I thought, when a doubt rose to my mind.

LABEL: 0xA2D4
STRING: According to the investigation schedule my sister had talked so much about, today was the day she was supposed to return to land.

LABEL: 0xA334
STRING: Why in the world was ROMLES calling me at this time――

LABEL: 0xA374
STRING: Anxiety kicked in.

LABEL: 0xA390
STRING: The next words the man on the other side of the phone said had my full attention.

LABEL: 0xA3D2
STRING: 「I'm truly sorry

LABEL: 0xA3E5
STRING: for your loss.」

LABEL: 0xA468
STRING: What――?

LABEL: 0xA47E
STRING: What did he say just now?

LABEL: 0xA49A
STRING: 「I'm sorry to inform you that your sister has passed away in an accident during her investigation.」

LABEL: 0xA4FE
STRING: ...What did that mean?

LABEL: 0xA520
STRING: What... what was he talking about?

LABEL: 0xA54A
STRING: I didn't understand.

LABEL: 0xA578
STRING: I stopped thinking.

LABEL: 0xA594
STRING: Unable to think or even understand what was happening, the man on the phone continued without hesitation.

LABEL: 0xA64D
STRING: Accident under investigation――

LABEL: 0xA6C8
STRING: Submarine unrecoverable――

LABEL: 0xA747
STRING: Dead――

LABEL: 0xA936
STRING: 「...It was Nee-san's birthday that day.」

LABEL: 0xA96A
STRING: 「I spent the next few days trying to figure out what was going on...」

LABEL: 0xA9A4
STRING: 「I remember that some of my relatives came to my house.」

LABEL: 0xA9DA
STRING: 「And, a lot of people from ROMLES came to express their sympathies.」

LABEL: 0xAA0E
STRING: 「All faces that I didn't know――」

LABEL: 0xAA3A
STRING: 「After a while, when things settled down, I finally felt it.」

LABEL: 0xAAEF
STRING: 「Ah. Nee-san is dead.」

LABEL: 0xAB19
STRING: That was the beginning.

LABEL: 0xAB37
STRING: The root of the obsession I'd been holding on to for the past seven years.

LABEL: 0xAC27
STRING: When I raised my head, Hiragino was looking at me with a grim face.

LABEL: 0xAC72
STRING: 「You've always――」

LABEL: 0xACEF
STRING: 「...No, sorry.」

LABEL: 0xAD13
STRING: 「About your sister, I... No――」

LABEL: 0xAD4F
STRING: 「I didn't know there was such an accident in the first place.」

LABEL: 0xAD94
STRING: 「Of course not.」

LABEL: 0xAE09
STRING: I could feel my mouth twisting in self-deprecation.

LABEL: 0xAE41
STRING: 「A single fatality is a small and insignificant accident for a huge organization.」

LABEL: 0xAE8D
STRING: 「ROMLES weighed the risks of announcing the accident and covering it up.」

LABEL: 0xAED5
STRING: 「As a result..」

LABEL: 0xAEF3
STRING: 「The accident was covered up.」

LABEL: 0xAF19
STRING: 「And, that was it.」

LABEL: 0xAFB2
STRING: Yes, it was over just like that.

LABEL: 0xB04D
STRING: My sister had died.

LABEL: 0xB06B
STRING: That's what I was told and what I knew.

LABEL: 0xB097
STRING: The ideals of ROMLES, the vision of the plan,

LABEL: 0xB0BF
STRING: what Nee-san strived for, what she sacrificed herself for...

LABEL: 0xB0F7
STRING: ...I didn't want to make any accusations now.

LABEL: 0xB127
STRING: That wouldn't change anything... but still.

LABEL: 0xB159
STRING: But still, I――

LABEL: 0xB1E3
STRING: ――I wanted to see the truth of what had happened with my own eyes.

LABEL: 0xB272
STRING: 「Nee-san died...」

LABEL: 0xB298
STRING: 「...And the submarine was deemed unsalvageable.」

LABEL: 0xB2CA
STRING: 「...So, she's still sleeping in this sea.」

LABEL: 0xB37B
STRING: A sunken submarine――

LABEL: 0xB399
STRING: When I asked ROMLES for an explanation, they just repeated that "it was an accident" and "we can't recover it."

LABEL: 0xB3F1
STRING: I asked for at least some details about the accident but was refused.

LABEL: 0xB433
STRING: 「The Voyage Data Recorder could not be recovered.」

LABEL: 0xB470
STRING: ROMLES didn't tell anything more to me.

LABEL: 0xB4A8
STRING: VDR―the ship's black box.

LABEL: 0xB4D3
STRING: A data recorder that was required to be installed on vessels.

LABEL: 0xB507
STRING: It was supposed to contain all the information before and after the accident, but it was lost at the bottom of the sea and deemed "unrecoverable."

LABEL: 0xB5C6
STRING: However... Some people were able to escape.

LABEL: 0xB5F2
STRING: So why did my sister have to die?

LABEL: 0xB62C
STRING: Why did ROMLES keep hiding the reason――

LABEL: 0xB6C9
STRING: And like that, a week passed, then a month, and a year...

LABEL: 0xB6FF
STRING: The sadness of losing her didn't go away.

LABEL: 0xB799
STRING: At the bottom of the sea, alone in a sunken ship...

LABEL: 0xB7C5
STRING: And the obsession that was left behind.

LABEL: 0xB846
STRING: 「The coordinates written in my sister's notebook...」

LABEL: 0xB872
STRING: 「They pointed to Kurama Bay, deep beneath the <Isle of Wind>.」

LABEL: 0xB8A6
STRING: 「That's where she still lies, unrecovered...」

LABEL: 0xB8EA
STRING: 「――That was how it was supposed to be!!」

LABEL: 0xB910
STRING: Kurama Bay, the <Isle of Wind>... Those keywords kept repeating themselves.

LABEL: 0xB948
STRING: Hiragino looked up suddenly as if he had realized something.

LABEL: 0xB982
STRING: I looked into his eyes and nodded.

LABEL: 0xB9A8
STRING: 「Yes.」

LABEL: 0xB9BE
STRING: 「Where we are now,

LABEL: 0xBA3B
STRING: is "there."」

LABEL: 0xBA55
STRING: 「At a depth of 700 meters――」

LABEL: 0xBA73
STRING: 「A distance beyond the reach for ordinary people, no matter how hard they try.」

LABEL: 0xBAB1
STRING: 「...If it were on land, you could run it in less than three minutes.」

LABEL: 0xBB54
STRING: 「But still, that distance was so far away――」

LABEL: 0xBBE5
STRING: 「So, I decided to use ROMLES.」

LABEL: 0xBC8D
STRING: 「Use them?」

LABEL: 0xBCAA
STRING: I nodded back at Hiragino.

LABEL: 0xBCD0
STRING: 「I used the name of the lab and the business card of a ROMLES executive who came to pay his respects to my sister.」

LABEL: 0xBD26
STRING: 「They must've felt guilty since they didn't reject me.」

LABEL: 0xBD6E
STRING: 「That's how I ended up in the system development department of ROMLES, even though I was a graduate student.」

LABEL: 0xBE40
STRING: 「...You threatened ROMLES?」

LABEL: 0xBE71
STRING: 「Who knows... They might've thought so.」

LABEL: 0xBEAD
STRING: 「But I couldn't bother myself with that.」

LABEL: 0xBF05
STRING: No matter what anyone thought, no matter what...

LABEL: 0xBF35
STRING: I needed to get into ROMLES.

LABEL: 0xBF69
STRING: 「The first thing was to find out why she had died.」

LABEL: 0xBF99
STRING: 「...Why she had to die.」

LABEL: 0xBFCB
STRING: 「I was going to find out the truth behind it.」

LABEL: 0xBFF7
STRING: 「Eventually, when I was assigned to the <SHEEP III> project, it felt like fate.」

LABEL: 0xC04A
STRING: 「While writing the navigation program, I kept looking for information...」

LABEL: 0xC08C
STRING: 「But I couldn't find anything.」

LABEL: 0xC0BA
STRING: 「And then it hit me.」

LABEL: 0xC0E8
STRING: 「Information isn't just something stored inside a computer.」

LABEL: 0xC126
STRING: 「If only I could go below the sea――」

LABEL: 0xC158
STRING: 「Then I heard about this ceremony and thought it was a good opportunity.」

LABEL: 0xC1AA
STRING: 「I rewrote the program.」

LABEL: 0xC1DC
STRING: It was a simple plan.

LABEL: 0xC1FE
STRING: The more time you spent diving, the deeper you could go.

LABEL: 0xC23E
STRING: I just set up a dummy timer...

LABEL: 0xC274
STRING: It was perfect...

LABEL: 0xC2E5
STRING: It was supposed to be.

LABEL: 0xC303
STRING: And yet――!

LABEL: 0xC31D
STRING: My hands clenched into fists.

LABEL: 0xC3FD
STRING: 「Here... It was supposed to be here!」

LABEL: 0xC435
STRING: 「The submarine from seven years ago... Nee-san...」

LABEL: 0xC467
STRING: 「But there was nothing on the radar.」

LABEL: 0xC4AE
STRING: 「Did... you get something wrong?」

LABEL: 0xC4E9
STRING: Hiragino asked, but he was off the mark.

LABEL: 0xC519
STRING: I shook my head from side to side.

LABEL: 0xC53D
STRING: 「That's not all...」

LABEL: 0xC5DA
STRING: 「It's strange!」

LABEL: 0xC5F6
STRING: 「Something like this can't be happening!」

LABEL: 0xC624
STRING: 「This ship is a pleasure cruise.」

LABEL: 0xC6BB
STRING: 「I'm sure it's built with extraordinary care for safety since the general public will be on board.」

LABEL: 0xC715
STRING: 「If there was an obstacle in our path, it would automatically avoid it... There's no reason why such a system wouldn't exist.」

LABEL: 0xC779
STRING: 「Anti-collision systems have been standard equipment in passenger cars for how long now?」

LABEL: 0xC7CD
STRING: 「Here, out in the middle of nowhere,

LABEL: 0xC852
STRING: what did this ship run%Ninto?!」

LABEL: 0xC87E
STRING: 「The exterior of this ship isn't so fragile that it can be wrecked like that just by hitting a rock.」

LABEL: 0xC8D8
STRING: 「What――」

LABEL: 0xC8F2
STRING: 「What happened――」

LABEL: 0xC91C
STRING: 「I have no idea――」

LABEL: 0xC95C
STRING: I let out my thoughts as if shouting.

LABEL: 0xC986
STRING: ...I had revealed everything.

LABEL: 0xC9B0
STRING: My past, present, and――

LABEL: 0xCA51
STRING: There was a long silence.

LABEL: 0xCA69
STRING: Only the slow time at the bottom of the sea flowed between me and Hiragino.

LABEL: 0xCAAB
STRING: Then, after a while, Hiragino spoke.

LABEL: 0xCBBE
STRING: 「...I understand your situation.」

LABEL: 0xCBE7
STRING: His eyes were darker than ever before.

LABEL: 0xCC87
STRING: 「――Look.」

LABEL: 0xCCA3
STRING: 「You absolutely must not blame yourself.」

LABEL: 0xCD34
STRING: 「Absolutely.」

LABEL: 0xCD55
STRING: His voice was not loud, but his tone was intense.

LABEL: 0xCD91
STRING: But... Don't blame myself?

LABEL: 0xCDBF
STRING: 「That's...」

LABEL: 0xCDDB
STRING: 「If I hadn't done this...

LABEL: 0xCE90
STRING: all those people would still be...」

LABEL: 0xCF0D
STRING: A scene flashed back to me.

LABEL: 0xCFE4
STRING: And there, Hikari.

LABEL: 0xD000
STRING: The deaths of all those strangers were my fault――

LABEL: 0xD182
STRING: 「Stop it!」

LABEL: 0xD1A5
STRING: Hiragino shouted in a strong voice.

LABEL: 0xD233
STRING: 「You've definitely committed a sin.」

LABEL: 0xD259
STRING: 「But the only thing you did... was rewrite the program.」

LABEL: 0xD2A1
STRING: 「And change the route...」

LABEL: 0xD2C1
STRING: 「No more, and no less――」

LABEL: 0xD2F6
STRING: 「That can't be!」

LABEL: 0xD31A
STRING: 「You think it's okay to kill people if it's not intentional?!」

LABEL: 0xD352
STRING: 「Enough with the childish hypocrisy!」

LABEL: 0xD384
STRING: 「I'm a murderer――」

LABEL: 0xD414
STRING: 「So what!?」

LABEL: 0xD435
STRING: Hiragino drew near me and grabbed me by the chest.

LABEL: 0xD467
STRING: The tablet case slipped off the table and made a noise.

LABEL: 0xD4B8
STRING: 「What the hell are we supposed to do?!」

LABEL: 0xD4E8
STRING: 「What difference does it make if you plead guilty?!」

LABEL: 0xD579
STRING: 「You can suffer all you want, confess your sins all you want, but...」

LABEL: 0xD5C3
STRING: 「...God isn't kind enough to judge you here and now.」

LABEL: 0xD723
STRING: He tightened his grip, and I could feel my consciousness slowly fading.

LABEL: 0xD74D
STRING: As I struggled and hit his chest, he loosened his grip.

LABEL: 0xD789
STRING: My weight returned back to my feet.

LABEL: 0xD7CF
STRING: 「Haah, haah, haah...」

LABEL: 0xD7F5
STRING: I exhaled deeply as I was released...

LABEL: 0xD823
STRING: You're tall, so be mindful of your strength...

LABEL: 0xD853
STRING: I turned a resentful gaze toward him.

LABEL: 0xD885
STRING: While I was desperately trying to take in oxygen, Hiragino turned his back to me.

LABEL: 0xD931
STRING: 「Besides...」

LABEL: 0xD951
STRING: 「Now's not the time to talk about this.」

LABEL: 0xD9AC
STRING: Hiragino looked at Reiri lying on the bed.

LABEL: 0xD9EA
STRING: She had now stopped having spasms and was sleeping peacefully.

LABEL: 0xDA96
STRING: 「I didn't say anything earlier.」

LABEL: 0xDAC2
STRING: 「That girl, the reason why Reiri collapsed in the corridor...」

LABEL: 0xDB59
STRING: 「It probably had nothing to do with her pre-existing condition.」

LABEL: 0xDB89
STRING: 「She was mildly cyanotic... due temporary lack of oxygen.」

LABEL: 0xDBD0
STRING: Lack of oxygen... Dyspnea?

LABEL: 0xDBF4
STRING: What was his point?

LABEL: 0xDC1C
STRING: What did this have to do with my crime?

LABEL: 0xDC44
STRING: Could she not breathe well inside this submarine?

LABEL: 0xDC89
STRING: 「In other words, suffocation...」

LABEL: 0xDCB1
STRING: 「...No, let's not be coy about it.」

LABEL: 0xDCE5
STRING: 「There's a good chance that Reiri was strangled by someone.」

LABEL: 0xDD30
STRING: Strangled... What did he say?

LABEL: 0xDD52
STRING: What was Hiragino trying to tell me?

LABEL: 0xDD84
STRING: While I was taken aback, Hiragino slowly put his fingers on his neck.

LABEL: 0xDDEF
STRING: 「Just around here.」

LABEL: 0xDE13
STRING: 「There were pressure marks left by something... Probably a human hand.」

LABEL: 0xDE5E
STRING: 「That being said――」

LABEL: 0xDE8B
STRING: 「There are two possibilities.」

LABEL: 0xDEB3
STRING: 「The first one: someone left while we were playing chess and strangled her.」

LABEL: 0xDF26
STRING: Who would that be?

LABEL: 0xDF9B
STRING: ...It couldn't be.

LABEL: 0xDFB9
STRING: What was he trying to insinuate here?

LABEL: 0xE04F
STRING: Touri,

LABEL: 0xE0C7
STRING: Tokiwa,

LABEL: 0xE141
STRING: and Yukari――

LABEL: 0xE155
STRING: The faces of those three flashed through my mind.

LABEL: 0xE17E
STRING: One of them had strangled Reiri?

LABEL: 0xE2C2
STRING: 「And the other possibility.」

LABEL: 0xE2E4
STRING: 「It's possible that there's someone else still lurking on this ship.」

LABEL: 0xE32D
STRING: 「...Wait a second.」

LABEL: 0xE34F
STRING: 「...Just, wait...」

LABEL: 0xE38D
STRING: I needed to collect myself.

LABEL: 0xE3AD
STRING: Concentrate on what Hiragino has to say.

LABEL: 0xE3D1
STRING: To my surprise, I wasn't outright denying him.

LABEL: 0xE3FF
STRING: I had to organize the information so far――

LABEL: 0xE431
STRING: 「――In other words.」

LABEL: 0xE44D
STRING: 「Either way, the culprit is hiding in the front section.」

LABEL: 0xE48D
STRING: Besides me, there was another "culprit" on board.

LABEL: 0xE4C7
STRING: Even if I confessed my crime and received punishment, nothing would be solved?

LABEL: 0xE581
STRING: 「That's what I'm talking about.」

LABEL: 0xE5A1
STRING: 「The sprinkler system that activated earlier...」

LABEL: 0xE5CD
STRING: 「We checked, but there was no sign of fire anywhere.」

LABEL: 0xE609
STRING: 「Momoi said she couldn't detect a fire on the console in the wheelhouse either.」

LABEL: 0xE6BE
STRING: 「So it seems like someone pressed the fire alarm button, perhaps deliberately.」

LABEL: 0xE731
STRING: ...So, that's what it was.

LABEL: 0xE753
STRING: Although Hiragino's story was startling, it shone a light on several out-of-place things.

LABEL: 0xE7A7
STRING: ...There was not a single wisp of smoke in the hallway where the sprinklers were activated.

LABEL: 0xE7F9
STRING: So that's why Yukari went to look for the scene of the fire and came right back.

LABEL: 0xE847
STRING: If there had actually been a fire, putting aside Tokiwa and Touri, Yukari would've been more upset.

LABEL: 0xE8AB
STRING: A fire in an enclosed space of a submarine was a matter of life and death.

LABEL: 0xE94F
STRING: 「Do you understand?」

LABEL: 0xE972
STRING: 「The alarm and sprinklers.」

LABEL: 0xE99E
STRING: 「The culprit who strangled Reiri used them to distract us...」

LABEL: 0xE9F2
STRING: If all of that was their intention, then――

LABEL: 0xEA3C
STRING: 「What was their goal?」

LABEL: 0xEA68
STRING: Hiragino just shook his head.

LABEL: 0xEA8C
STRING: Why... What for...?

LABEL: 0xEAB8
STRING: Thud.

LABEL: 0xEAD2
STRING: The sound of Hiragino's footsteps echoed in the quiet emergency room.

LABEL: 0xEB06
STRING: He gently caressed Reiri's head.

LABEL: 0xEC0B
STRING: 「I have a favor to ask of you.」

LABEL: 0xEC38
STRING: 「Of me?」

LABEL: 0xEC52
STRING: He changed the subject again.

LABEL: 0xEC7A
STRING: Hiragino nodded slowly.

LABEL: 0xED0C
STRING: 「It's something only you can do.」

LABEL: 0xED3A
STRING: 「Will you find out what's happening on this ship?」

LABEL: 0xED81
STRING: ...Huh?

LABEL: 0xED97
STRING: 「...Wait a minute.」

LABEL: 0xEDB9
STRING: 「I'm not mishearing you, right?」

LABEL: 0xEDE3
STRING: 「Why me?」

LABEL: 0xEE77
STRING: 「Do you refuse?」

LABEL: 0xEE96
STRING: 「No, there's nothing to refuse. I just don't understand.」

LABEL: 0xEECE
STRING: 「I'm the one who created this situation in the first place.」

LABEL: 0xEF74
STRING: 「And that's exactly why you hold the key to overcoming our current situation.」

LABEL: 0xEFB0
STRING: 「That's what I'm feeling.」

LABEL: 0xEFD9
STRING: 「A feeling――」

LABEL: 0xF015
STRING: I definitely felt responsible for this accident.

LABEL: 0xF04D
STRING: But that didn't mean I couldn't do something about it now...

LABEL: 0xF091
STRING: I'd lost everyone's trust, my own confidence, everything...

LABEL: 0xF0D1
STRING: As I was hesitating, Hiragino pressed me for an answer.

LABEL: 0xF16D
STRING: 「This is also certain...」

LABEL: 0xF191
STRING: 「You were the only one who didn't step out of the playroom back then.」

LABEL: 0xF1DC
STRING: 「――You mean to say then...」

LABEL: 0xF1F8
STRING: 「That one of us

LABEL: 0xF211
STRING: is the culprit?!」

LABEL: 0xF23D
STRING: I got emotional.

LABEL: 0xF25D
STRING: But Hiragino continued to stare right at me.

LABEL: 0xF305
STRING: 「I don't want to doubt everyone.」

LABEL: 0xF325
STRING: 「I believe in them... But this is in order to keep believing.」

LABEL: 0xF35F
STRING: 「I can't deny it without making sure.」

LABEL: 0xF3F2
STRING: 「...Are we in agreement, or...?」

LABEL: 0xF4D2
STRING: 「Haha...」

LABEL: 0xF506
STRING: Had to laugh.

LABEL: 0xF535
STRING: 「A number of inexplicable things have already happened.」

LABEL: 0xF56D
STRING: 「And we don't know what's going to happen next.」

LABEL: 0xF59F
STRING: 「...So please.」

LABEL: 0xF5B9
STRING: 「I don't mean to be unreasonable, but just keep this in mind.」

LABEL: 0xF600
STRING: I couldn't believe the culprit had been assigned as the detective.

LABEL: 0xF630
STRING: This plot development was in poor taste.

LABEL: 0xF65E
STRING: Totally... ridiculous.

LABEL: 0xF6E5
STRING: ――However.

LABEL: 0xF6FF
STRING: If I could be of any help,

LABEL: 0xF727
STRING: I was going to do what I could.

LABEL: 0xF7C7
STRING: 「Go and meet up with the others.」

LABEL: 0xF7F2
STRING: 「What about you?」

LABEL: 0xF87A
STRING: 「...I can't leave her alone.」

LABEL: 0xF8AF
STRING: Hiragino looked down at Reiri lying on the bed.

LABEL: 0xF8DD
STRING: Leaving a patient alone and in danger...

LABEL: 0xF911
STRING: I guess he felt a sense of responsibility as a doctor.

LABEL: 0xF947
STRING: He didn't look my way anymore as he sat down on a chair beside Reiri's bed.

LABEL: 0xF9DB
STRING: I left the emergency room by myself.
